anya-e1215n:23_0: Savaṇā lapanā ceva satiyā cāpi vandanā,
anya-e1215n:29_0: Yo lokatilako nātho pūretvā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:32_0: Ārādhito surādīhi kālo mārisa te ayaṁ,
anya-e1215n:35_0: Etadatthāya te vīra pūritā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:36_0: Bāhuṁ pitussa putto’va loko ālambate tuvaṁ;
anya-e1215n:38_0: Tesaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā mahāsatto mahāmatī,
anya-e1215n:50_0: Janānaṁ nīlanettehi vadanehi tu yā purī,
anya-e1215n:98_0: Nivedetvā tamatthaṁ sā rañño tena susajjite,
anya-e1215n:113_0: Brahmāno lokapālā ca manussā kamato tadā,
anya-e1215n:116_0: Mahiṁ patiṭṭhito dhīro passitvāna tato disā,
anya-e1215n:128_0: Dibbehi rūpasaddehi gandhehi ca rasehi ca,
anya-e1215n:135_0: Dassetvā’sesasippaṁ taṁ loke vijjati yaṁ tadā;
anya-e1215n:137_0: Ñātisaṅghaṁ pamodento deve ca manuje’pi ca,
anya-e1215n:165_0: Sasī’va dassanīyo ca sūriyo viya tejavā;
anya-e1215n:201_0: Vajjanti bheriyo tāsu paggayha kāci nāriyo;
anya-e1215n:204_0: Dhamanti susiraṁ kāci kāci vādenti tantiyo;
anya-e1215n:212_0: Disvāna so tamacchariyaṁ viratto visaye tadā,
anya-e1215n:219_0: Iccevaṁ cintayanto so supantova sayī tahiṁ;
anya-e1215n:222_0: So’yaṁ’dāni supī’ amhe kassadāni karoma taṁ?;
anya-e1215n:224_0: Iti cintiya te tattha turiyesu sake sake,
anya-e1215n:227_0: Khādanti kāci dantāni kāci lālā vahantiyo,
anya-e1215n:230_0: Kākacchanti’pi semhampi gilanti ca camanti ca,
anya-e1215n:231_0: Karonti nādaṁ nāsāya gharū’ti ca khipanti ca;
anya-e1215n:233_0: Muttayanti tadā kāci rahassaṁ vicaranti ca,
anya-e1215n:234_0: Duggandhaṁ vāti taṁ ṭhānaṁ susānaṁ āmakaṁ yathā;
anya-e1215n:237_0: Addakkhi tāsaṁ nekāni vikārāni tahiṁ tadā;
anya-e1215n:252_0: Buddho hutvāpi’maṁ sakkā passituṁ iti cintiya;
anya-e1215n:254_0: Gato nātho tato ṭhānā bodhiyā baddhamānaso
anya-e1215n:255_0: Tadahevāsi buddhoti kāmuko ko na cintaye;
anya-e1215n:279_0: Pasatto tattha turago dukkhato agamī tadā;
anya-e1215n:284_0: Tīraṭṭho passi so dhīro gaṅgānāriṁ rasāvahaṁ,
anya-e1215n:290_0: Pabbajituṁ mayettheva yuttaṁ no me papañcituṁ,
anya-e1215n:297_0: Tiṭṭhatu gagane gantvā iti ukkhipi ca’mbaraṁ;
anya-e1215n:302_0: Kāretvā maṇithūpaṁ so nīdhetvā taṁ siroruhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:308_0: Pubbe viyambaraṁ gayha ambare khipi nāyako,
anya-e1215n:309_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṁ brahmā netvā brahmapuraṁ caraṁ;
anya-e1215n:317_0: Tato ambavanaṁ gantvā vindanto pītijaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:327_0: Disvā evaṁ vicintesuṁ nāyaṁ yo so janādhipo;
anya-e1215n:332_0: Sutvāna taṁ tadā keci hasantā vacanantaraṁ,
anya-e1215n:333_0: Nāyaṁ sasī sasaṅekā so bhānumeso’ti no mati;
anya-e1215n:338_0: Kiṁ bho ummattakā attha evaṁ mā vadathā’dhunā,
anya-e1215n:339_0: Sataraṁsī uṇharaṁsī na so eso aviggaho;
anya-e1215n:342_0: Sarūpena na no atthi saṁsayo balu mānase;
anya-e1215n:344_0: Tesaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā hasantā keci jantuno,
anya-e1215n:345_0: Tumhe khalū na jānātha sabāṇe sadhanū hi so;
anya-e1215n:348_0: Kelāso iti sampatto jahātha vimatiṁ idha;
anya-e1215n:350_0: Tesampi vacanaṁ sutvā hasanteke janā tadā,
anya-e1215n:351_0: Nāyaṁ haro tinetto so kesaveso idhāgato;
anya-e1215n:354_0: Vesenaññena maññāma ettha no natthi saṁsayo;
anya-e1215n:356_0: Paharitvā karaṁ keci sutvā taṁ vacanaṁ narā,
anya-e1215n:357_0: Hasantevaṁ tadāvocuṁ vāsudevo na ve ayaṁ;
anya-e1215n:363_0: Passitunti paṭiññāto mā bhonto vilapantu ve;
anya-e1215n:365_0: Sutvā tesaṁ giraṁ keci keḷiṁ katvāna nekadhā,
anya-e1215n:366_0: Tumhe sakkaṁ na jānātha so hi bho vajirāyudho;
anya-e1215n:368_0: Eso hi bho mahābrahmā brahmalokā idhāgato,
anya-e1215n:369_0: Pamattā kinnu vedamhī brahmabandhu pure idha;
anya-e1215n:372_0: Nete candādayo kāmaṁ mā mohaṁ bho pakāsatha;
anya-e1215n:380_0: Evaṁ vadantā sabbe te nāgarā purisuttamaṁ,
anya-e1215n:384_0: Jantavo mananāvāyo pāraṁ passiṁsu no tadā;
anya-e1215n:395_0: Amataṁ viya taṁ bhutvā vikkhāletvā mukhaṁ dakā,
anya-e1215n:396_0: Patte vattaṁ caritvāna muhuttaṁ tattha vissami;
anya-e1215n:408_0: Pakāsetvāna lokassa mokkhaṁ natthiti tena so;
anya-e1215n:416_0: Tadā senāni nigame sujātā khīra dāyikā,
anya-e1215n:422_0: Yathā mayhaṁ mahādeva iddhā patthita patthanā,
anya-e1215n:425_0: Iti vatvāna vanditvā katvā ca naṁ padakkhiṇaṁ,
anya-e1215n:435_0: Disvāna supine pañca atthaṁ tesaṁ vicintiya;
anya-e1215n:447_0: Tato mahiṁ dvidhā katvā samuṭṭhāsi mahāsanaṁ;
anya-e1215n:452_0: Kāmaṁ taco nahārū ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
anya-e1215n:455_0: Na uṭṭhahāmabujjhitvā na jahe vīriyaṁ mama,
anya-e1215n:516_0: Nāgatā neva vāhesuṁ sabbe etthe’va osaṭā;
anya-e1215n:519_0: Nāgādayo na dhutāsuṁ ketunaṁ bahu kā kathā;
anya-e1215n:522_0: Tārakā gagane brūmo kinnu tattha dhajālutā;
anya-e1215n:540_0: Nosīnā dharaṇī bhārā disebhānaṁ balaṁ aho;
anya-e1215n:560_0: Kañcanādāsahatthā ca kācī kaññā tathā ṭhitā,
anya-e1215n:563_0: Kāci maṅgala saṁyutta vacanā tava patthanā,
anya-e1215n:569_0: Naccanti keci kīḷanti selenti ca lalanti ca,
anya-e1215n:570_0: Vādenti keci gāyanti velukkhepaṁ karonti ca;
anya-e1215n:594_0: Pūjāvisesaṁ taṁ ko hi mukhenekena bhāsatī;
anya-e1215n:597_0: Dasakaṇṭho’pi taṁ sabbaṁ neva sakkonti bhāsituṁ;
anya-e1215n:602_0: Tasmintu vāsare māro passitvā bhuvanaṁ idaṁ,
anya-e1215n:605_0: Sabbe dibbavimānā bho suññā dissanti chaḍḍitā,
anya-e1215n:608_0: Kimbho māra na jānāsi matto sutto’si ajja kiṁ,
anya-e1215n:612_0: Bodhimule nisinno si ajja buddho bhavāmīti;
anya-e1215n:617_0: Kinnu te badhiraṁ sotaṁ kinnu parihāyi locanaṁ,
anya-e1215n:618_0: Dhajaggā te na dissanti ullolaṁ te na sūyati;
anya-e1215n:620_0: Tesaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā antako khalu pāpimā,
anya-e1215n:624_0: Asāro khalu saṁsāro siddhatthe vibhavaṁ gate;
anya-e1215n:629_0: Nirālokaṁ tilokaṁ bho asuraṁ vāsaraṁ yathā,
anya-e1215n:638_0: Māpetha bheravaṁ vaṇṇaṁ bībhacchaṁ duddasaṁ kharaṁ,
anya-e1215n:641_0: Tassa taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā mārasenā samāgamuṁ,
anya-e1215n:647_0: Disvāna durato ettaṁ devā māraṁ savāhiniṁ,
anya-e1215n:650_0: Saṁkhippa khippaṁ sacchattaṁ brahmā dhāvi parammukho,
anya-e1215n:651_0: Katvāna piṭṭhiyaṁ saṅkhaṁ sakko dhāvi visaṅkito;
anya-e1215n:669_0: Andhakāraṁ disā āsuṁ dhūmaketu ca ambare;
anya-e1215n:684_0: Na yuttañhi gajo yāti gajaṁ no yāti kotthukaṁ;
anya-e1215n:686_0: Netaṁ garu palāpetuṁ kālo iti vicintiya,
anya-e1215n:708_0: Cāletuṁ neva so sakkhi aṁsumattampi cīvare;
anya-e1215n:714_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:720_0: Hotu dāni mahoghena pavāhemi imaṁ yatiṁ,
anya-e1215n:736_0: Mahābhīma nabho bherissanā āsuṁ tahiṁ tahiṁ;
anya-e1215n:751_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:757_0: Bhavatajja kimetena māraṇe tassa kiṁ garu,
anya-e1215n:760_0: Iti cintiya so māro māpetvāṅgāra vuṭṭhiyo,
anya-e1215n:782_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:786_0: Dukkhito dummano hutvā evaṁ cintesi dummati;
anya-e1215n:804_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:820_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:823_0: Taṁ disvā pāpimā kuddho yaṁ yaṁ tassa karoma’haṁ,
anya-e1215n:824_0: Taṁ taṁ’dānī na sakkoti kiñci kākumu’pakkamaṁ;
anya-e1215n:836_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:839_0: Tato disvāna taṁ kaṇho kaṇhasenā purakkhato,
anya-e1215n:840_0: Saṅkuddho pesayi tattha vassaṁ so sikatāmayaṁ;
anya-e1215n:849_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:855_0: Iti cintiya māpetvā pesesi palipaṁ ghanaṁ,
anya-e1215n:856_0: Dhūpāyanto pajjalanto gantvā so nabhasā lahuṁ;
anya-e1215n:865_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:871_0: Mayhaṁ bhāroti cintetvā māpesi timiraṁ ghanaṁ;
anya-e1215n:874_0: Gantvāna gaganā so hi patvāna munisantikaṁ;
anya-e1215n:883_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:886_0: Evaṁ navahi vuṭṭhihi katvā māro mahā bhavaṁ,
anya-e1215n:895_0: Tatheva so mahiṁ kuddho māro khipati vegavā,
anya-e1215n:898_0: Tatheva kupito tena khipate so mahambudhiṁ,
anya-e1215n:899_0: Vilayaṁ jalajā yanti sussate so mahaṇṇavo;
anya-e1215n:908_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:911_0: Iti kopagginā dittamanaṁ māraṁ tadā jino,
anya-e1215n:914_0: Evaṁ katvāpi so kuddho aladdhavijayo tadā,
anya-e1215n:923_0: Athagā saha vācāhi bhiṁsā sā māravāhinī,
anya-e1215n:942_0: Bhujaṅge ca guṇe keci gāḷhamākaḍḍhayanti ca;
anya-e1215n:957_0: Gattena rakkhasā hutvā keci dhāvanti kiṅakarā;
anya-e1215n:971_0: Gilantā keci phaṇino uggirantā tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:972_0: Sīsa kandhara kaṇṇanta bāhu aṅguli ādisu;
anya-e1215n:981_0: Lālayantā sakā jivhā khandhe katvāna muggare,
anya-e1215n:993_0: Yaṁ diṭṭha suta mattena maraṇaṁ citta vibbhamaṁ,
anya-e1215n:994_0: Yāti loko kathaṁ ko taṁ nissesaṁ bhāsate naro;
anya-e1215n:1011_0: Sahassabāhuṁ māpetvā chūrikā yaṭṭhi satti ca,
anya-e1215n:1021_0: Āvahanto bhayaṁ brahma sura siddhādīnaṁ tadā,
anya-e1215n:1030_0: Akampo so munī evamagge’kāsi nijaṁ balaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1049_0: Suṇātha bho giraṁ mayhaṁ bhavatajja mahā bhavo;
anya-e1215n:1051_0: Etha yātha samaggattha na ossakkatha sujjhatha,
anya-e1215n:1054_0: Ajja gacchati niṭṭhānaṁ so bho pāramitābhaṭā,
anya-e1215n:1057_0: Atha dānabhaṭo āha apphoṭaṁ diguṇaṁ bhujaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1061_0: Ubho passe karitvāna saseno dhāvi dappavā;
anya-e1215n:1073_0: Sosemi mama tejena vadaṁ’gā māra sāgaraṁ;
anya-e1215n:1082_0: Nisidi tassa tejena nirussāhāsi sā camū;
anya-e1215n:1084_0: Aho bho vimhayaṁ dāni suṇātha munino mama,
anya-e1215n:1088_0: Aduṭṭho jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1091_0: Nirāyudho’va taṁ jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1094_0: Niccalo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1097_0: Nisinnova jino jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1100_0: Nissaddo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1106_0: Khippaṁ siddhattha he gaccha santakedaṁ mamāsanaṁ;
anya-e1215n:1108_0: No ce gacchasi te hadayaṁ phālemi nakhasattihi,
anya-e1215n:1111_0: Passa me mahatiṁ senaṁ passa āyudhasañcayaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1112_0: Tena taṁ abhimaddāmi tuvaṭaṁ gacchidaṁ mama;
anya-e1215n:1115_0: Kadā te pūritā māra pallaṅkatthāya pāramī;
anya-e1215n:1117_0: Kadā adāsi sīsādī dānaṁ sīlaṁ kathaṁ tava,
anya-e1215n:1120_0: Athā’ha pharuso māro netaṁ garu mune mama,
anya-e1215n:1121_0: Ayaṁ sā parisā sabbā tassa paccakkhakārakaṁ;
anya-e1215n:1126_0: Athāha māro samaṇa ahaṁ sakkhi kathāpayiṁ,
anya-e1215n:1127_0: Tava ko sakkhi yajjatthi kathāpehi lahuṁ mama;
anya-e1215n:1129_0: Athāha bhagavā tassa gambhīraṁ madhuraṁ giraṁ,
anya-e1215n:1132_0: Taveva me na santīdha paccakkhatthaṁ sacetanā,
anya-e1215n:1135_0: Iti vatvāna mārāri sañtdhā jimūta gabbhato,
anya-e1215n:1162_0: Aṅguliyo mukhe keci pakkhipanti rudanti ca,
anya-e1215n:1163_0: Keci vandanti yāvanti abhayaṁ sāmi dehi no;
anya-e1215n:1171_0: Taṅkaṇe uggato āsi satthu kitti jayaddhajo,
anya-e1215n:1178_0: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:1184_0: Devā te nikhilā netvā nānāpūjāvidhiṁ tato,
anya-e1215n:1194_0: Dhamentā viya saṅkhāni kūjenti madhuraṁ giraṁ;
anya-e1215n:1212_0: Āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇā laddhā aggaphalaṁ tadā;
anya-e1215n:1220_0: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi puna gehaṁ na kāhasi,
anya-e1215n:1221_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṁ visaṅkhitaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1232_0: Pāpārayo ca vijito sa dadātu santiṁ;
anya-e1215n:1349_0: Hā tāta hā tāta kimāsi tedaṁ
anya-e1215n:1350_0: Naṭṭhannu te kiṁ vada patthasī kiṁ,
anya-e1215n:1526_0: Giriṁ nakhena khaṇatha ayo dantehi khādatha;
anya-e1215n:1823_0: Tvaṁ ko’si re! Iti paro aparaṁ kharena
anya-e1215n:1842_0: Muḷhā disañca vidisaṁ na vidiṁsu bhītā,
anya-e1215n:1874_0: Ogamma tattha puthu patthari camma kaṇḍaṁ;
anya-e1215n:1893_0: Tasmimpi te pavisituṁ saraṇaṁ na laddhā
anya-e1215n:1919_0: Lokagga puggala varaṁ dada sāmi dhīsa;
anya-e1215n:1923_0: Tumhe vinā khaṇalavaṁ vasituṁ na icche
anya-e1215n:1933_0: Katvā’tha so vara mahaṁ tidivehi saddhi
anya-e1215n:1974_0: Magge phale ca saraṇe ca patiṭṭhahiṁsu
anya-e1215n:2014_0: Atha ca duhituyā so dīyamānaṁ dadanto
anya-e1215n:2050_0: Sumana sumana nāmaṁ passi devaṁ samiddhiṁ;
anya-e1215n:2105_0: Thuti mukhara mukhā tā sādhu kīḷaṁ akaṁsu;
anya-e1215n:2107_0: Atha muni uragānaṁ viggahaṁ taṁ sametuṁ
anya-e1215n:2112_0: Na bho bho saṁsāre khalu bhavati sāraṁ lavampi
anya-e1215n:2113_0: Visesā taṁ sītaṁ jalita dahane vijjati kadā,
anya-e1215n:2114_0: Sadā rāgaṁ rogaṁ byadhati janataṁ nekaduritaṁ
anya-e1215n:2117_0: Sarīro’yaṁ battiṁsa vidha kuṇapo sāra rahito
anya-e1215n:2120_0: Athevaṁ sante bho varayati bhavaṁ ko nu hi budho;
anya-e1215n:2124_0: Phaṇī majjāro sā guhaka kapayo bhūya bahuso
anya-e1215n:2127_0: Pure kāko’lukā atha vanabhavā phandana isā
anya-e1215n:2132_0: Balaṁ bālānaṁ bho saka saka vadhāyeva bhavati
anya-e1215n:2134_0: Gajaṁ bālaṁ mattaṁ pavidhi na balaṁ hoti saraṇaṁ
anya-e1215n:2135_0: Athaṭṭhāne kiṁ bho kurutha vīriyaṁ bhuti hananaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2137_0: Na dukkhaṁ tesaṁ ye vigata kalahā ekamanasā
anya-e1215n:2138_0: Atīte bho lāpā aghaṭita mānā peyyavacanā,
anya-e1215n:2139_0: Sukhaṁ vāsaṁ’kāsuṁ yadahani bhavuṁ te’tha vidhurā
anya-e1215n:2144_0: Atha muditamanā te pīṇitā tassa nāgā
anya-e1215n:2148_0: Taruṇa raviva tasmiṁ āsane āsi bhāsaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2162_0: Yadi sugata! Imaṁ tvaṁ nāgato assa ṭhānaṁ
anya-e1215n:2165_0: Pasami dahana dittaṁ ambudeneva taṁ tvaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2173_0: Yadi manasi dayā te hoti dāse punā’pi,
anya-e1215n:2180_0: Sa sumana taru rājaṁ pūjanatthaṁ vidhāya;
anya-e1215n:2185_0: Dadati iti ca vatvā ovaditvāna satthā;
anya-e1215n:2293_0: Yo neka kappa sata sañcita puññarāsi
anya-e1215n:2296_0: Ko tattha bhuti matulaṁ kathiko katheti;
anya-e1215n:2315_0: Ñatvā taṁ sumano nāgo lahumāgamma sīhalaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2321_0: Datvā tulādayo sesa mandiraṅge tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:2328_0: Soṇṇa kiṅkiṇi mālāyo kaṇṇamālā ca māpiya;
anya-e1215n:2351_0: Sañcinitvāna te nāgā khajja bhojja phalāphale,
anya-e1215n:2354_0: Tato kāruṇiko nātho bodhito aṭṭhame same,
anya-e1215n:2387_0: Sāsanodaya selagge sūriyo viya bhāti yo,
anya-e1215n:2391_0: Pākaṭo bhuvane so’pi gato sambuddha santikaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2441_0: Tato sambuddha dehasmā nikkhantāsuṁ cha raṁsiyo,
anya-e1215n:2466_0: Uggantvā parato yantī nīra nijjhara sannībhā;
anya-e1215n:2469_0: Kārayantā sakaṁ vaṇṇaṁ dhāvantā’pi ca sindhavo;
anya-e1215n:2490_0: Yāti kiṁ buhmalokannu amhākaṁ bhavanannu kho;
anya-e1215n:2499_0: Yāvamānā jinaṁ keci tiṭṭhanti ca mahanti ca;
anya-e1215n:2513_0: Yesaṁ yesaṁ manasmiṁ yaṁ yamatthi kiñci saṁsayaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2514_0: Tesaṁ taṁ taṁ paṇudento desanāya sudhāsinaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2520_0: Paṭimaggaṁ karontā te tattha tattha mahāmahaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2525_0: Ye passanti jinaṁ tattha sasissaṁ siriyā jalaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2528_0: Ye suṇanti tadā dhammaṁ dhammissara pabhāvitaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2529_0: Suladdhā tehi sotāni tesaṁ sotāni sotakā;
anya-e1215n:2532_0: Suladdhā tehi ve jivhā tesaṁ jivhā rasaññakā
anya-e1215n:2534_0: Ye vandanti jinaṁ yantaṁ sasaṅghaṁ gaganaṅgane,
anya-e1215n:2535_0: Suladdhā tehi hatthāni tesaṁyeva bhujā bhujā;
anya-e1215n:2537_0: Tadā tathāgataṁ disvā ye santuṭṭhā tathāgataṁ,
anya-e1215n:2538_0: Tathāgatānaṁ sabbesaṁ yo toso hotu sabbadā;
anya-e1215n:2543_0: Tato gaṅgā manuññañhi sampattaṁ taṁ saputtakaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2549_0: Tato so yācito satthā nāgasaṅghehi vandiya,
anya-e1215n:2555_0: Tato bhikkhu nisīdiṁsu patta pattāsane tadā,
anya-e1215n:2562_0: Nettinda maṇināvāhi pāraṁ gantuṁ na te pabhu;
anya-e1215n:2564_0: Tato sasaṅghaṁ sugataṁ sajano maṇi akkhiko,
anya-e1215n:2578_0: Maggā janā khalu labhanti kadā patiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2583_0: Jātī jarā maraṇa dukkha pariddavā ca
anya-e1215n:2594_0: Rūpe na rajjatha tato khalu sādhupaññā;
anya-e1215n:2636_0: Evaṁ saddhammamaggaṁ varamati sugato desayi pannagānaṁ
anya-e1215n:2637_0: Sutvā te sampahaṭṭhā mahamahamakaruṁ nijjarādīhi saddhiṁ,
anya-e1215n:2638_0: Tesaṁ ve desanāyaṁ suraviṭapi samā sātthikā tattha jātā
anya-e1215n:2639_0: So nātho tañca dhammaṁ bhagavati tanayā te ca vo pālayantu
anya-e1215n:2719_0: Madhuka vaṭa kareri bodhi jambīra bhalli
anya-e1215n:2757_0: Siddhā ca siddhavanitā hi tahiṁ tahiṁ te
anya-e1215n:2763_0: Gokaṇṇa salla sasa jambuka sūkarā ca,
anya-e1215n:2773_0: Cakkavha kīra kurarā kulalā ca kaṅkā,
anya-e1215n:2789_0: Kāsātha sopi muni tassa vacaṁ paṭicca
anya-e1215n:2802_0: Gacchante gaganāyanena sugate bhānu’si santo tadā
anya-e1215n:2803_0: Vāresuṁ sūriyātapañca jaladā siñjiṁsu bhumyā jalaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2804_0: Mandāmanda sugandha muddha pavano pāpeti sitaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2805_0: Devādi dhaja chatta cāmarakarā pūjenti mānenti ca;
anya-e1215n:3032_0: Evaṁ so dhammarājā janahitavihito vīta dosārivaggo
anya-e1215n:3034_0: Taṁ vo saggā’pavaggaṁ dadati munisamaṁ citta matte pasanne
anya-e1215n:3035_0: Tasmā bho!Bho! Pahaṭṭhā namatha mahatha taṁ sādhu sādhuppasatthaṁ;
anya-e1215n:3040_0: Tatheva sādhū saṅakappā khippaṁ pappontu pāṇinaṁ;
anya-e1215n:3051_0: Tassa sisso’si yo vippagāma vaṁseka ketuko
